I've been so impressed with your growth mindset. I've said that a few times, including in public forum, but it's worth repeating. 1) working backwards from outcomes... this is something I am challenging all leaders to start doing much more formally. How are you going to move the needle at Rise8, what outcomes does it require, and then what activities and outputs?
